name: Summer Spa & Beauty Salon
description:
Best Girls games!

From The creators of A-list Spa & Beauty Salon and Spa makeup and dress up!

Welcome to the luxurious Spa Beauty Resort on the beach! A-list famous celebrities come here to pampering themselves! This Spa is known for the best beauty treatments and for the famous celebrity owner, YOU!

How to Play:

⋆You are Kim the owner of the salon. The clients want to look like barbie dolls in the end of your services.Reach the daily money goals. Earn money to buy more beauty stations, decoration, dress up and much more, just tap the button SHOP in the game!

⋆Satisfy your client's order by matching their wish with the desired service. Tap your client then tap the desired chair/wish. To get money touch the client and then tap the cash register.

Make money to buy beauty stations like:

⋆Hairdresser,
⋆Facial treatment
⋆Manicure
⋆Pedicure, do nails
⋆Spray Tan Booth
⋆Waxing
⋆Makeup
⋆Massage

Hope you enjoy this free girl game great for summer! Have fun in paradise!
